Reviews.Title: No better than a 1.3 MP cell fone camera
Reviews.Author: Bent Lady
Reviews.Content: Crappy camera, crappy pictures.  I've tried all settings, and all lighting arrangements.  The best shot you have at taking a picture that isn't blurry or horribly distorted is to have your subject to stand outside in the bright sunlight, and use the delayed shot setting (takes the picture 2 or 10 seconds after you push the button).  Then you will probably still have to take the picture 3 times to get one that doesn't look like it was on the television show Ghost Hunters.Bottom line, if you already have a cheap cell phone camera, you have as good or better quality camera than this one.  I do not recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: L. Breedveld
Reviews.Content: Hi,  Great camera.  We bought them for our teens.  The camera takes great pictures and is easy to use.

ProductInfo.Features:
7.1MP digital camera delivers crisp photos that you'll love to share
4x digital zoom helps you get in close to your subject so you can capture all the detail
Auto flash means that your photots will have the right amount of light even in low-light situations
Includes PhoTag Photo Editing software so you can get creative with your photos
PictBridgeTM compatible so you can connect your camera directly to your printer without a PC
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Concepts 7.1 MP Digital Camera With Anti-shake- Pink
